body_html:
It's unrelated to jemalloc. My guess is it's an issue with your usage of tcmalloc.

That error would happen if you call tcmalloc's malloc() and try to free with glibc malloc() and vice-versa. Disable tcmalloc?
body_text:
It's unrelated to jemalloc. My guess is it's an issue with your usage of tcmalloc.
That error would happen if you call tcmalloc's malloc() and try to free with glibc malloc() and vice-versa. Disable tcmalloc?
body:
It's unrelated to jemalloc. My guess is it's an issue with your usage of tcmalloc.

That error would happen if you call tcmalloc's malloc() and try to free with glibc malloc() and vice-versa. Disable tcmalloc?
